T02TD1798E:31b-23: dka' thab kyis ni mi gdungs par //
T02TD1798E:31b-24: ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02TD1798E:31b-25: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1798E:31b-26: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1798E:31b-27: nam yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing //
T02TD1798E:31b-28: slob dpon smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD1798E:31b-30: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02TD1798E:31b-31: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02TD1798E:31b-32: de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
T02TD1798E:31b-33: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1798E:31b-34: rims dang dgra dang dug dang nad //
T02TD1798E:31b-36: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02TD1798E:31b-37: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD1798E:31b-38: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02TD1798E:31b-39: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che//
T02TD1798E:31b-40: dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa //
T02TD1798E:31b-41: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD1798E:31b-42: bla ma la ni gus pas yon //
T02TD1798E:31b-43: rjes su mthun pa sbyin par bya //
T02TD1798E:31b-44: de nas rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02TD1798E:31b-46: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD1798E:31b-47: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD1798E:31b-48: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02TD1798E:31b-50: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD1798E:31b-51: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1798E:31b-52: de sbyin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
T02TD1798E:31b-53: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1798E:31b-54: gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
T02TD1798E:32a-2: lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru //
T02TD1798E:32a-3: deng khyod gyur par the tshom med //
T02TD1798E:32a-4: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas par //
T02TD1798E:32a-5: kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1798E:32a-6: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
T02TD1798E:32a-7: rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
T02TD1798E:32a-8: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02TD1798E:32a-9: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1798E:32a-10: khyed rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1798E:32a-11: de nyid thob par the tshom med //
T02TD1798E:32a-12: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02TD1798E:32a-13: rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyed bsten par gyis //
T02TD1798E:32a-14: deng ni 'gro ba myur du rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1798E:32a-15: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis //
T02TD1798E:32a-16: zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa'i sa la dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-17: de nas sngar bstan pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin no //
T02TD1798E:32a-19: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1798E:32a-20: ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyi'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-23: rin chen khyim dang glang po rta //
T02TD1798E:32a-24: yul dang mal stan rnams dang ni //
T02TD1798E:32a-25: bran dang bran mo chung ma sdug / bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang //
T02TD1798E:32a-26: gang gis bdag kyang dbul bya na //
T02TD1798E:32a-27: lhag ma rnams lta ci zhig smos //
T02TD1798E:32a-29: des ni dbang bzhi pa yon dang bcas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-30: de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ste /
T02TD1798E:32a-31: de la las so so'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD1798E:32a-32: las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg go //
T02TD1798E:32a-33: de la las so so'i sbyin sreg ni de la zhi ba la ni zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su de'i phyed do //
T02TD1798E:32a-34: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi rgyar khru do //
T02TD1798E:32a-36: dbang la ni zla gam rgya dang zabs zhi ba dang mthun no /
T02TD1798E:32a-37: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum rgyar sor nyi shu zabs su de'i phyed do //
T02TD1798E:32a-38: de dag kyang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa /
T02TD1798E:32a-39: grva bzhir zla ba phyed pa la rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa sgo bzhir lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis mtshan pa thab kyi dbus kha khyer la yang zhi ba la ni 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba /
T02TD1798E:32a-40: rgyas pa la ni rin po che dang rin po che'i phreng ba /
T02TD1798E:32a-41: dbang la ni padma dang padma'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-42: mngon spyod la ni khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa dang de nyid kyi phreng ba'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-43: zhi ba la ni kha dog dkar po'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-44: rgyas pa la ni ser po'o //
T02TD1798E:32a-46: mngon spyod la ni nag po'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-0: yam shing yang zhi ba la au dumw'a @32b ra la sogs pa'o ma can gyi shing las byas pa mtho gang rtse mor mnyam par bcad pa rtse mo gnyis pa la lo ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-1: de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang yam shing de nyid la yang sboms su chang gang srid khru gang bya'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-2: dbang la ni aa shva ka dang bri yang ku la sogs pa'i shing la yang yam shing la sogs zhi ba'i tshad du bya'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-3: mngon spyod la ser ldeng dang po son cha'i shing las sor brgyad pa'i tshad du bya'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-4: zhi ba la ni til la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-5: rgyas pa la ni zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-6: dbang la ni me tog gis so //
T02TD1798E:32b-7: dgug pa la ni ba lang gi sha yis so //
T02TD1798E:32b-8: mngon spyod la ni sha chen gyis so //
T02TD1798E:32b-9: tshe bsring ba la ni d'ur bas so //
T02TD1798E:32b-10: bsrung ba la ni ku sha mar du sbags pas so //
T02TD1798E:32b-11: hom gzar la yang las dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-12: hom gzar dang dgang gzar dang sreg rdzas dang mchod yon la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1798E:32b-13: sngags pa'i rgyan la sogs pa thams cad las dang rjes su mthun par kha dog bsgyur ro //
T02TD1798E:32b-14: sngags pa'i stang stabs kyang zhi ba la ni byang du blta'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-15: rgyas pa la ni shar du blta'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-16: mngon spyod la ni ltor blta'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-17: dbang la ni nub tu blta'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-18: gsad pa la ni shar lhor ro //
T02TD1798E:32b-19: bskam pa'am zhe sdang la ni lho nub tu'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-20: bskrad pa dang dbye ba la ni nub byang du'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-21: rmongs pa dang rengs pa la ni byang shar du'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-22: zhi ba la ni 'jam zhing 'bol ba'i stan nang tshangs can no //
T02TD1798E:32b-23: rgyas pa la ni ku sha'i stan rgya dang dpangs su khru gang sor bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-24: dbang la ni padma'i stan no //
T02TD1798E:32b-25: mngon spyod la ni stan med pa'am dur khrod kyi ras so //
T02TD1798E:32b-26: las so so'i me lha yang zhi ba la ni pa ba ka sku mdog dkar po'i 'od kyis gzi brjid kyang dkar po 'phro ba'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-27: rgyas pa la ni me lha dbang chen zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog ser po'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-28: dbang la ni me lha dmar po zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog dmar po'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-29: mngon spyod la ni me lha rlung zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog nag po'o //
T02TD1798E:32b-30: de dag kyang spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa mchod phyir thogs pa dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i me lha ni g-yas gnyis na dbyug to dang skyabs sbyin /
T02TD1798E:32b-31: g-yon gnyis na gundhe dang bgrang phreng /
T02TD1798E:32b-32: dbang gi me lha ni g-yas pa na dbyug pa dang lcags kyu /
T02TD1798E:33a-2: mngon spyod kyi me lha ni g-yas dang po na ral gri /
T02TD1798E:33a-4: g-yon dang po na zhags pa /
T02TD1798E:33a-6: las so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha yang zhi ba la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog dkar po'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-7: rgyas pa la ni rin chen 'byung ldan gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog ser po'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-8: dbang la ni 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog dmar po'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-9: mngon spyod la ni mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog nag po'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-10: gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyis skyes pa dgug pa la sogs pa khro bo bcu'i las so so ni rang rang gi las gtso bor byas pa'i las dang rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-11: spyan gyis zhi bar bya ba dang shu li nis klu'i bu mo dgug pa dang /
T02TD1798E:33a-12: gnod mdzes kyis lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug pa la sogs pa phal cher phyag rgya re re la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-13: de yang dgug pa ni dbang gi khongs su bsdus nas bstan no //
T02TD1798E:33a-14: bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang gsad pa dang rengs pa dang rmugs pa ni mngon spyod kyi khongs su bsdus nas bstan pa'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-15: aom ta kki ni p'a pa ka aa gna ye ta kki h'um dza: //
T02TD1798E:33a-16: zhi ba'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1798E:33a-17: aom ta kki ni ma hi na kra aa gna ye ta kki h'um dza:/
T02TD1798E:33a-18: rgyas pa'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1798E:33a-19: aom ta kki ni dza k'a ma aa gna ye ta kki ni h'um dza:/
T02TD1798E:33a-20: dbang gi me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1798E:33a-21: aom ta kki ni dza:h'um bam ho: h'um kro dha te dza aa gna ye h'um dza:/
T02TD1798E:33a-22: mngon spyod kyi me lha spyan drang pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1798E:33a-23: de dag ni las so so'i sbyin sreg go //
T02TD1798E:33a-24: da ni las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg bshad de /
T02TD1798E:33a-25: de yang padma'i dbyibs lta bu'i thab khung bya ste /
T02TD1798E:33a-26: rgyar khru gang sor bzhi zabs su de'i phyed /
T02TD1798E:33a-27: thab khung gi phyi rol du sor bzhi dor ba kha khyer gyi rgya dang dpangs su sor bzhi yod pa /
T02TD1798E:33a-28: thab kyi nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad yod pa /
T02TD1798E:33a-29: dbus kyi lte ba la rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-30: shar la sogs pa'i padma la 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-31: mtshams kyi padma dag la autpala dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu bri'o //
T02TD1798E:33a-32: kha khyer gyi nang du sor bzhi dor ba la las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog can padma'i phreng ba lta bus bskor ro //
T02TD1798E:33b-0: de nyid la padma'i dbyibs @33b lta bu zhes bya'o //
T02TD1798E:33b-1: nang du yang mtha' skor du rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro //
T02TD1798E:33b-2: phyi rol du yang kha khyer la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro //
T02TD1798E:33b-3: grva bzhir rdo rje bzhis brgyan pas thab khung nyid sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa lta bur brtag go //
T02TD1798E:33b-4: sngar bstan pa'i las so so'i thab khung ni re'u mig brgyad du brtag par bya ste /
T02TD1798E:33b-5: de yang phyag rgya dgod pa ni dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba'i dbang gis ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02TD1798E:33b-6: 'dir las thams cad pa'i me lha ni lnga pa mi ta zhes bya ba yin te las dang rjes su mthun par bskyor do //
T02TD1798E:33b-7: las thams cad pa'i lha ni lha thams cad pa'i bdag nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do ;
T02TD1798E:33b-8: / de yang thab kyi khor yug tu yang shing lo sngon pos g-yogs la de'i steng du rtsva ku sha sngon po gtsang ma'i bsang gtor gyis bsangs la /
T02TD1798E:33b-9: mgo rtsa phan tshun du non pas g-yas skor du 'khor bar dgram mo //
T02TD1798E:33b-10: mchod rdzas ni g-yon du dgram /
T02TD1798E:33b-12: de dag kun la aom badzra sa tva aa /
T02TD1798E:33b-13: zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pas byin gyis brlab pas bya'o //
T02TD1798E:33b-14: hom gzar yang yu ba khru gang sor bzhi zabs su sor gnyis blugs gzar rgyar sor bzhi zabs su sor gnyis mchu la sor bzhi rin po che'am padma'i dbyibs su byas pa'i dkyil du rdo rje sor gnyis pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1798E:33b-15: dgang gzar sor gnyis zabs su sor gcig mchu la sor gnyis bya'o //
T02TD1798E:33b-16: gnyis ka'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha'i yig 'bru gcig bsam mo //
T02TD1798E:33b-17: de la 'di ni rdzas dbus ba'i sngags te /
T02TD1798E:33b-18: aom nam:sa manta bu ddh'a n'a na aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-20: aom aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-22: aom sa rbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a aa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-24: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-26: aom badzra ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-28: aom badzra ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a t'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-30: aom badzra gha smar ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-32: aom badzra aa dznya ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-34: aom bo dhi bri ksha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-36: aom badzra la t'a la sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-38: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-40: aom badzra ha sa ka r'a aa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:33b-42: yam shing de dag ni aardzu na la sogs pa'i shing legs pa gang rnyed pa la bzlas pa byas la mngon par sngags ti sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-0: las kyi bye brag la zhi ba la ni sv'a ha'i mtha' dang @34a * //
T02TD1798E:34a-2: rgyas pa la ni boo shata he'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-3: dbang la ni nam hi'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-4: dgug pa la ni dza'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-5: mngon spyod la ni h'um gi mtha' dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-6: sreg rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa ni mar la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas ni zhal du'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-7: yam shing dang mi rus bsres pa'i phye ma dang bdug sbos ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34a-8: zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'i kha zas dang til dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag tu dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34a-10: me tog ni spyi bo ru'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-12: mchod yon dang mar me ni mdun du'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-13: de la sngags pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa las dang rjes su mthun pas ram las bskyed pa'i me'o //
T02TD1798E:34a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su aa las gyur pa'i sna tshogs padma'i steng du gdan zhi ba la chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1798E:34a-15: rgyas ba la gser gyi sa gzhi //
T02TD1798E:34a-17: mngon spyod la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du las dang mthun pa'i mi lha dam tshig sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la /
T02TD1798E:34a-19: aom aa gna ye ma h'a te dza sarba ka rmma ma h'a sa t'a ka:/
T02TD1798E:34a-20: k'a ru na kri tas t'a aa rtha s'a dha a'a simm sa nni bha ba /
T02TD1798E:34a-21: zhes bya ba 'dis nam mkha'i spyod yul nas ye shes kyi me lha thab kyi g-yas phyogs su spyan drangs la las thams cad pa'i chu yis bsang gtor byas la /
T02TD1798E:34a-22: mchod yon gyi snod du mchod yon dang /
T02TD1798E:34a-24: mchod pa dang bstod pa tshul bzhin du byas te /
T02TD1798E:34a-25: de la aom dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram /
T02TD1798E:34a-27: / aom ni ri ti h'um kham /
T02TD1798E:34a-29: aom a'a: badzra pu shepa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34a-31: aom a'a :badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34a-33: aom a'a: badzra ga ndhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34a-35: aom a'a:badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34a-37: aom a'a:badzra nee bi dye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34a-39: de nas dgang blugs kyi sngags kyis mar dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34a-40: drag po yin na shing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34b-0: de ltar zhal du phul yang spyan gyi 'od zer gyis reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par 'gyur ba'i don gyas na spyan la @34b dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34b-1: de ni spyir mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1798E:34b-2: de nas bye brag tu mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD1798E:34b-3: de nas shing khru gang la ras kyis dkris la rgyal po dang /
T02TD1798E:34b-6: gdol pa'i khyim nas las dang mthun par me blangs la de spar te btsugs nas rlung yab kyis g-yab cing /
T02TD1798E:34b-7: aom badzra rdzva la dzva la h'um phat /
T02TD1798E:34b-9: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'um ta dzva la ya sa rbba du shat'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1798E:34b-10: dri shya ho dza: h'um bam ho :bam ya stam /
T02TD1798E:34b-11: zhes pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims la spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du rnam par snang mdzad nas gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1798E:34b-12: gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD1798E:34b-13: de nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mar dgang blugs gsum mam bdun dbul lo //
T02TD1798E:34b-14: de nas bkra shis kyi yam shing ngo //
T02TD1798E:34b-19: ku sha rim pa bzhin du dbul lo ;
T02TD1798E:34b-20: / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha me lha ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las nges par byung ba'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms la /
T02TD1798E:34b-22: aom ye hye hi bha ga b'a na sanni da pa nytsa na sa ma ye na tsa a'a k'a sa pra t'i tstsha a'a hu p'u dza n'a dam bra siddha me /
T02TD1798E:34b-23: zhes bya bas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1798E:34b-24: de ltar bstan pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas pa de la mchod pa dang /
T02TD1798E:34b-26: sbyin sreg gi khyad par gyis mnyes par byas la yi ge gsum gyis bdag gi thugs kar bsdu'o //
T02TD1798E:34b-27: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du mnyes par bya ste bzod pa gsol la /
T02TD1798E:34b-28: las bcol la rang rang gi gnas su gtang ngo //
T02TD1798E:34b-29: de nas me lha ye shes sems dpa' la mchod yon dang /
T02TD1798E:34b-31: mchod pa dang bstod pas mnyes par byas la mar dgang blugs gsum phul te sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1798E:34b-32: aom kri to ba sarbba satva rtha //
T02TD1798E:34b-33: siddhi ma dtt'a ya th'a nu ga /
T02TD1798E:34b-34: gatstsha tva'm bu ddha bi sha yam //
T02TD1798E:34b-35: pu ra na ra ga man ya tstsha mu:/
T02TD1798E:35a-0: de nas me lha dam tshig sems dpa' la tshogs kyi lhag ma dang sbyin sreg gi @35a * //
T02TD1798E:35a-1: lhag mas ci nus kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-2: de la dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bgegs zhi bar byed na /
T02TD1798E:35a-3: mi rus phye mas gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi phreng bas bya'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-4: slob ma'i sdig pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir g-yon phyogs su rtsod pur 'dug la /
T02TD1798E:35a-5: slob ma'i sor mo gung mo slob dpon gyi mtheb srin gyis bzung la til dang de'i sngags ci nus kyis zhi bar bya'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-6: de nas me lha de nyid thugs kar bsdu sbyin sreg gi yo byad de dag slob dpon gyis yin pas gzhan gyis spyad du mi rung ngo //
T02TD1798E:35a-7: slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-8: de nas dge ba'i rtsa pa bsdo ba dang /
T02TD1798E:35a-9: smon lam btab ste thab kyi nang chus bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-10: de dag ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02TD1798E:35a-12: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mthur rab gnas kyi cho ga bya ste /
T02TD1798E:35a-13: snga dro'i dus su slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad tshogs par bya ste /
T02TD1798E:35a-18: 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab te /
T02TD1798E:35a-19: mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas la /
T02TD1798E:35a-20: 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sems can gyi don gyi phyir rab tu bzhugs par gsol ba btab ste /
T02TD1798E:35a-21: de nas sbyin sreg gis mnyes par byas nas bkra shis par byin gyis brlab pa 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1798E:35a-22: thams cad stong pa zab cing phra bas na //
T02TD1798E:35a-23: rtog ge'i yul min 'khrul pas shes mi nus //
T02TD1798E:35a-24: des na de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1798E:35a-25: rim gnyis thabs kyi sngon 'gro'i cho ga yin //
T02TD1798E:35a-26: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1798E:35a-28: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang /
T02TD1798E:35a-29: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
